medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 5-day history of abdominal pain, starting with moderately-intense pain over the right flank during a scheduled session of hemodialysis. One day later, she noticed hematuria, and the abdominal pain slowly worsened. On the ___, the pain worsened in intensity and migrated to her lower abdomen, leading her to seek further medical evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Hypertension; 2. Polycystic kidney disease/ESRD; 3. C-section; 4. Varicose veins; 5. History of lumbar discopathy; 6. Migraine.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for polycystic kidney disease in her father who probably started dialysis when he was about ___ years old. The father's brother may have a history of polycystic kidney disease. Her children have had renal ultrasounds showing bilateral cysts in the kidney.
